article_title: Lights Flicker for Utilities--Heard on the Street
article_text:
What if the stock market's safest sector was doomed?

Utilities seem indispensable. Yet suddenly there is talk on Wall Street of a looming "death spiral" for the business, with solar power being the culprit.

Hyperbole? Yes, but only up to a point. Back in May, the Dow Jones Utility Average came within a whisker of its precrisis...

twitter.description: The supposedly rock-solid business of utilities begins to feel its mortality as new technologies make inroads.
twitter.title: Lights Flicker for Utilities
twitter.creator: @liamdenning

Yet suddenly there is talk on Wall Street of a looming "death spiral" for the business, with solar power being the culprit.
Back in May, the Dow Jones Utility Average came within a whisker of its precrisis...
What if the stock market's safest sector was doomed?
Yes, but only up to a point.
